segments.text: I ’ d like to make a collect call to Beijing China , please .

segments.text: What ’ s the number you are calling , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the name of the person you are calling ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . What ’ s your name and phone number , please ?

segments.text: Thank you . I ’ ll put the call through for you . Hold on the line , please .
